org.mmbase.util.transformers

Class Asciifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.util.transformers.StringTransformer
      • org.mmbase.util.transformers.Asciifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, CharTransformer, Transformer

    public class Asciifier
extends StringTransformer
    Transforms strings to ascii strings. Non-ascii characters will become question marks. Optionally, the question marks can be replaced by another character. After some examples I found at http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2096667/convert-unicode-to-ascii-without-changing-the-string-length-in-java
    Since:
    MMBase-1.9.5
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    André van Toly
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setReplacer(String r)
